name: POV Breast Grab
description:
Update (3/14/2023) - V2 Release

  • This is the release of Breast Grab V2 - 30 pictures were added to the dataset. It was re-trained and a trigger word was added to improve consistency.

  • I suggest using this LoRA at 0.7-1.0 weight for best results.

  • The trigger word is povbreastgrab

  • Make sure to always add povbreastgrab, pov hands, breast grab with the LoRA to properly activate it.

  • It helps the AI if you add a breast size - It also helps if you add nipples to the prompt but you don't have to.

  • CivitAI changes the name of the LoRA - If you copy and paste the prompt exactly from the previews - It will not work.

  • After that you can add other descriptive tags (pov, deep skin, huge breasts, large breasts, medium breasts, from below.)

  • Use CLIP SKIP 2.

Known Issues

  • Sometimes the arms will fuse together or her arm will bend backwards but you can fix this by just adding 1boy.

  • Try lowering the weight of the Breast Grab LoRA when using with character LoRAs. 0.6-0.7 worked best for me.

  • If you don't add nipples to the prompt - It will try to generate the hands over the top of them but sometimes it will generate the hands from beneath and her breasts just won't have nipples.

This was trained on NAI model. I have no idea if it works with realistic models. It works perfectly on some models and some others don't.

Embeds and LoRAs used

Bad Prompt - Giovanna - Every other character seen is in my profile.

Follow me on Twitter for updates- https://twitter.com/TrueHeroBang

Everything I'm making will always be free but if you want to show a little bit more support, you can buy me a coffee - https://ko-fi.com/ekune
